Montegrotto Terme and Abano Terme are the ancient home of Aponus, god of thermal waters and curative virtues, honored thousands of years ago by the Venetians and Romans, who left a precious heritage of wisdom and the tradition of the pleasures of thermal cures and treatment. Today this tradition has been taken up by the  wellness centers of Abano and Montegrotto Terme which have made wellness their mission.

Montegrotto Terme has an archeological site with the ruins of the original Roman Thermae and the "Casa delle Farfalle", an original exotic park where thousands of species of butterflies are seen hovering among plants and flowers, and the "Bosco delle Fate", with elves, druids, and fates from Celtic and paleovent legends.
